file_content.text: I come to pay for what I took. Knowledge and a warning.
The Dark Heart is Sel-Makor's prison. I exist to prevent his escape.
Through you, I know how to banish Sel-Makor forever.
I'm expecting something valuable in return.
I deserve a reward.
Everything costs.
If I fail to contain Sel-Makor, all existence is at risk.
Sounds like a worthy cause.
Glad I could help.
If Sel-Makor escapes, all existence is at risk.
Voss demands payment.
Should this mean anything to me?
Why should I care?
You felt Sel-Makor's power. In his domain, he is all-powerful. Able to trap even your Emperor.
If he is unbound, his domain spreads. Nothing could defy him.
You helped. I grant you this secret--be warned, one of your own plots to betray you.
Tell me which one.
Who?
The vision ends. You must be the interpreter.
After what I've been through, I always have my eyes open.
I'm not concerned.
Everyone sleeps.
Thanks.
Voss bids you farewell.
Voss welcomes you, outsider. Why do you seek Madaga-Ru?
He has knowledge I need.
To learn.
Who or what are you?
Identify yourself.
One answer costs another.
I'm not in a sharing mood.
Resistance is wasteful.
You asked an audience. You must give to get. It is the Voss way.
Tell me your purpose. Or divulge a secret. Or all ends here.
I'll give no secret, but I will answer your question--Madaga-Ru has knowledge I seek.
I'll tell you my purpose.
A worthy goal.
I search for a being called the Voice of the Emperor--the embodiment of the Empire's ruler.
I'll tell you who I seek.
During my training, I severed the hand of my first master instead of killing him, as ordered.
I spared Overseer Tremel.
On Tatooine, I spared a Jedi Master named Yonlach when I was supposed to kill him.
I spared an enemy's life.
On Nar Shaddaa, I was supposed to kill my old master's rival, Lord Rathari; instead, I made him my minion.
I let a rival live.
On Hoth, I was supposed to destroy a legendary Jedi Master named Wyellett but instead, allowed him to live and commune with the Force.
I spared an enemy's life.
I am betraying the dark side.
I walk the light path.
A secret is given as payment.
There is nothing I can share with you that is sensitive or unknown.
I have no secrets.
That is its own admission. Payment is made.
Madaga-Ru will meet you. The location is revealed.
